features: 【Super Absorbent】--Excellent quality all-purpose Microfibre cleaning cloths with over 300,000 fibers per square inch. They deliver extreme absorbency and heavy towel and set wicks water fast to keep you dry. Use wherever dirt, grime and liquids need to be removed quickly, easily and safely.

【Soft & Lint Free】--Ultra-soft, non-abrasive microfibre cloths leave no scratch on surfaces, paint, glass or coatings. No matter if you're cleaning your kitchen or your car. This powerful towel will get rid of the toughest grease, grime and dirt. Keep your home or your car shiny.
【Remarkable Durability and Reusability】--It can be washed and reused hundreds of times with no worry of it being shrunk, fallen apart or lost any cleaning power! Saving your time and money!

【Easy Care And Use】--Comes in 5 colors enables you to color code for different cleaning tasks. Regular microfiber towels have hard nylon edges that can scratch paint when polishing and drying. AIDEA drying towels use premium fabrics with a soft, scratch-free feel throughout, keeping your car shiny and completely intact.
【Eco-friendly & Sustainable】--Commit to high-performance reusable microfibre cleaning with no harmful chemicals for your health, the well-being of your family, and the sustainability of our planet.
description: Product Description Ultra Versatile Not only for cars, but AIDEA cleaning cloth can also eliminate grease, grime, fingerprints, and food spills from countertops, appliances, stainless steel, cupboards, kitchen floors, and more with the highest-quality microfibre cleaning products available. Perfect for House, Surface, or Car Cleaning. Highly Absorbent The soft microfibre used in these cloths is super absorbent and made to trap dirt, grime, and other particles. One-hand Used Cloth absorbs water more & faster and dries faster than cotton, Safe for all hard surfaces. Can be used for Kitchen, for Windows, and for Car. Machine Washable AIDEA Microfibre Car Detailing Cleaning Cloth is made with premium microfibre for ultimate softness and durability and washed hundreds of times without losing its absorbency and softness. Used and trusted by the highest echelon of auto enthusiasts.
